maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. These are the headquarters of the Woodland Vanguard.\. Nice to see you around!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Bienvenue au quartier général de l'\v[lore.title.faction-heat-jungle].\. Ravie que vous soyez là !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Kacela Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Kacela Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We got nothing to do for you right now.\. Nice to see you, though!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Actuellement nous n'avons pas de travail pour vous.\. Mais ravie de vous voir quand même !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Hey there!\. You're a \v[lore.title.seeker] aren't you?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Hé yo !\. Vous êtes un \v[lore.title.seeker], pas vrai ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Great, just what I needed.\.\.\. ...no,\. really,\. we do have an urgent need for a \v[lore.title.seeker] here.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Super, c'est exactement ce dont j'ai besoin.\.\.\. ... non,\. vraiment,\. on a vraiment besoin d'un \v[lore.title.seeker] en urgence là.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Our recent progress led us into some areas with heavy critter-concentration, so we need some additional muscle.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Notre progression récente nous a mené dans certaines contrées avec une grande concentration en créatures, donc il nous faut des muscles supplémentaires.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Well, not just muscle... also smarts and specialized \v[lore.title.seeker] skills.\. Sounds like just your thing?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Oui bon, pas juste du muscle... aussi de l'intelligence et des talents spéciaux de \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Ça devrait être votre truc, non ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Neat!\. And just like the briefing says, you won't be doing all the work by hand.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Super !\. Et comme le briefing le disait, vous n'allez pas faire tout le travail toute seule.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: A network of defensive turrets is already on site.\. State-of-the-art, almost indestructible and easy to use.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Un réseau de tourelles défensives se trouve déjà sur place.\. Dernier cri, presque indestructible et facile à utiliser.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: ...if you are connected to Trackwalker, that is.\. Someone failed to notice that when ordering a truckload of those things...
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: ... enfin si vous êtes reliés au système Retraçage, cela dit.\. Quelqu'un ne s'en est pas rendu compte lorsqu'il en a commandé un camion entier...

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: It's the main reason we need you at all, \v[lore.title.seeker].\.\. No offense.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: C'est la raison principale pour laquelle nous avons besoin de vous, \v[lore.title.seeker].\.\. Sans vouloir vous offenser.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Anyway, enter the cave in the \c[3]Calm Backyard of \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].\. You'll get the details there.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: En tout cas, entrez dans la grotte dans le \c[3]Jardin calme du \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].\. Vous aurez plus de détails là-bas.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Bye...
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Bye...

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Man, just our luck.\. I hope you can clear some time for us soon.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Ah, c'est pas de chance.\. J'espère que vous pourrez vous libérer du temps pour nous bientôt.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Go to \c[3]Calm Backyard in \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] and enter the cave.\. You'll get all the details there.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Allez dans le \c[3]Jardin calme du \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] et entrez dans la grotte.\. Vous aurez plus de détails là-bas.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], you're back.\. Seems like we finally made some progress, thanks to you.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: \v[lore.title.seeker], vous êtes de retour.\. On dirait que nous avons finalement fait des progrès, grâce à vous.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: The experts on site still need to properly open that door, but it's only a matter of time.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Les experts sur place ont encore besoin de chercher comment ouvrir proprement cette porte, mais ce n'est qu'une question de temps.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Hey, how does this sound: Once we make progress, we'll work together again, eh?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Hé, qu'est-ce que vous en dites : Si jamais on progresse, on continuera de travailler ensemble, OK ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Oh, and they also just finished that direct teleporter to the place!\. Great timing... Lemme activate it real quick...
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Oh, et ils viennent de terminer un téléporteur qui va directement vers la grotte !\. Quelle synchronisation parfaite... Attendez, je vais l'activer tout de suite...

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Great!\. I will send out a request over the Seeker Hub once we're ready.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Super !\. J'enverrai une requête via le Repère des Pisteurs une fois que l'on sera prêt.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Bye, \v[lore.title.seeker], hope to see you again!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Bye, \v[lore.title.seeker], j'espère que l'on se reverra !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We got nothing to do for you right now.\. Nice to see you, though!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Actuellement nous n'avons pas de travail pour vous.\. Mais ravie de vous voir quand même !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], nice seeing you again.\. Still interested in our temple excavation, I assume?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], ravie de vous revoir.\. Toujours intéressée par notre excavation de temple, je présume ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Well, of course you are!\. And we got some great news for you on that front:\.\. The door has been opened!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Oui, bien sûr que vous l'êtes !\. Et nous avons une bonne nouvelle pour vous :\.\. La porte a enfin été ouverte !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: We are now just about to plug into the track's energy circuits from the temple that lies behind it.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Nous allons juste nous brancher sur les circuits d'énergie du temple du tracé qui se trouve en dessous.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: But for that we will need someone to lead the defenses again.\. How about it, got some free time on your schedule?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Mais pour cela il nous faut quelqu'un pour mener les défenses.\. Qu'est-ce que vous en dites, vous avez du temps libre ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Alright, reliable as before I see.\. Let's hope that's also true for that tech you will be using again.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Je savais que je pouvais compter sur vous !\. J'espère que la technologie qu'on va utiliser est aussi fiable que vous.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: That defensive system from last time got a bit of an upgrade but should be working about the same.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Le système de défense de la dernière fois a subi quelques petites mises à jour, mais il devrait fonctionner pareil que la dernière fois.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Go back to that \c[3]Grubby Cave\c[0] on \c[3]Calm Backyard\c[0] and go through that door inside.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Revenez à cette \c[3]Grotte Sale\c[0] sur le \c[3]Jardin Calme\c[0] et passez à travers la porte.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: We already got some of our colleagues inside that can fill you in on the details.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Il y a déjà quelques collègues à nous à l'intérieur qui pourront vous donner plus de détails.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Yeah, goodbye.\. And good luck!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Oui, à plus tard.\. Et bonne chance !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Dang, you must really be busy.\. Hope you can find some time for us in the near future.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Mince, c'est que vous devez être très occupée.\. J'espère que vous pourrez bientôt trouver du temps libre pour nous.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: The temple is behind that door in the \c[3]Grubby Cave\c[0] you visited last time.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Le temple est juste derrière cette porte dans la \c[3]Grotte Sale\c[0] que vous avez visité la dernière fois.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: You can enter that cave from the \c[3]Calm Backyard\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Vous pourrez entrer dans cette grotte depuis le \c[3]Jardin Calme\c[0] dans le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Oh, hey!\. The \v[lore.title.seeker] makes her heroic return after once again taming the wild!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Oh, hé !\. Le \v[lore.title.seeker] fait son retour héroïque après avoir vaincu la nature !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Yes, you did a good job, indeed.\. And an important one.\. Replacing that device would've set us back for weeks if it broke.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Oui, c'était vraiment du bon travail.\. Et un travail important.\. Remplacer cet appareil nous aurait retardé pendant des semaines s'il avait été cassé.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: But now we can siphon that sweet, precious Track-energy and also extract more information for future missions.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Mais maintenant nous pouvons siphonner cette bonne et précieuse énergie du Tracé et aussi extraire des informations pour nos missions futures.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Hopefully, we can count on you again in the future, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Heureusement, nous pouvons encore compter sur vous à l'avenir, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: See you around!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: À plus tard !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Madaki
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Madaki

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We got nothing to do for you right now.\. Nice to see you, though!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Actuellement nous n'avons pas de travail pour vous.\. Mais ravie de vous voir quand même !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..orig: Enter the \c[3]Grubby Cave\c[0]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-adv-1..text: Entrez dans la \c[3]Grotte Sale\c[0]
